group.label: Product
group.comment: These settings are for the snippet configuration on the products pages.

field.label: Image mode
field.comment: If enabled 'All collection', all product images, except hidden ones, will be added to the scheme.

field.label: Show Product microdata for products without offers and rating
CSS Selectors
field.comment: You can specify a few values separated by commas.

field.label: Best Rating
field.comment: The biggest value for the rating can be 5, 10 or 100. By default and in case the field is left blank, 5 is set.

field.label: Disable Default Review Markup
field.comment: Disabled review markup added by theme.

field.label: Use Multiple Offer for Configurable Product
field.comment: Add several offers, one for each child product

field.label: SKU Attribute Code
field.comment: Select the SKU Attribute Code from Magento.

field.label: Use Deepest Category
field.comment: Handles the situation if some product is assigned to different categories.

field.label: Color Attribute Code
field.comment: Select the Color Attribute Code from Magento.

field.label: Manufacturer Attribute Code
field.comment: Select the Manufacturer Attribute Code from Magento.

field.label: Brand Attribute Code
field.comment: Select the Brand Attribute Code from Magento.

field.label: Model Attribute Code
field.comment: Select the Model Attribute Code from Magento.

field.label: Add Gtin
field.comment: The GTIN is a globally unique 14-digit number used to identify trade items, products, or services. Please use digits only when you add the GTIN for your products otherwise it will not be shown in the microdata.

field.label: Gtin Attribute Code
field.comment: Select the GTIN Attribute Code from Magento.

field.label: Use Special Price functionality for Price Valid Until
Product ID Attribute Code
field.comment:
This value will be used as productID in the Rich Snippets and as retailer_item_id in the Open Graph tags.
Recommended attributes are: sku, gtin, isbn, etc.

field.label: Default Option For Condition
field.comment: Specify the default condition option for the product if it doesn't have the condition attribute assigned.

field.label: Free Shipping Attribute
field.comment:
This setting allows you to select the free shipping attribute, which will be used to determine the products with the free shipping option.
Note: only attributes of "Yes/No" type are shown here.

field.label: Shipping Country
field.comment: This field is required.

field.label: Merchant Return Policy Attribute
field.comment:
This setting allows you to select the merchant return policy attribute, which will be used to determine the products with the merchant return policy option.
Note: only attributes of "Yes/No" type are shown here.

group.label: Category (Product List)
group.comment: These settings are for the snippet configuration on the category pages.

field.label: Enable In Rich Snippets
field.comment: Adds the snippets that will be shown on the search engine results page. The store owner can preview the snippet data on the special page.

field.label: Show Product Offers
field.comment: Informs search engines about the special product offers

field.label: Image mode
field.comment: If enabled 'All collection', all product images, except hidden ones, will be added to the scheme.

field.label: Enable for Google Assistant
field.comment: Adds the beta support for the recently added speakable markup.

field.label: CSS Selectors
field.comment: Add any CSS Selectors that the store owner wishes to be spoken aloud by Google Assistant/Google Home. You can specify a few values separated by commas.

field.label: Disable for NOINDEX Robots
field.comment: If set to Yes, hides the snippets on the categories that are not indexed.

field.label: Enable In Rich Snippets
field.comment: Adds the snippets that will be shown on the search engine results page. The store owner can preview the snippet data on the special page.

field.label: Enable In Open Graph
field.comment: Adding these tags helps the Facebook Crawler pick up the correct title, description and the suitable preview image for the shared page.

group.label: Page
group.comment: These settings are for the snippet configuration on the CMS pages.

field.label: Enable for Google Assistant
field.comment: Adds the beta support for the recently added speakable markup.

field.label: CSS Selectors
field.comment: Add any CSS Selectors that the store owner wishes to be spoken aloud by Google Assistant/Google Home. You can specify a few values separated by commas.

field.label: Enable In Rich Snippets ▾
field.comment: Adds the snippets that will be shown on the search engine results page. The store owner can preview the snippet data on the special page.

field.label: Enable Search Box
field.comment: This setting adds the sitelinks search box code to the website markup. Note: Google doesn't guarantee that a sitelinks search box will be shown in search results.

field.label: Website Logo
field.comment: Upload your website logo for the correct sharing on Facebook and using in OpenGraph markup. Allowed file types: PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG

field.label: Facebook App Id
field.comment: Can be taken from the facebook for developers website.

group.label: Seller
group.comment: These settings are for the snippet configuration of the entire store (your organization).

field.label: Enable In Rich Snippets
field.comment: Snippet will be added to the home page only. The store owner can preview the snippet data on the special page.

field.label: Name
field.comment: If the seller rich snippet is enabled, this field is required.

field.label: Image
field.comment:
If the seller rich snippet is enabled, this field is required.
Allowed file types: PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG.

field.label: Opening Hours
field.comment:
The list of opening hours
Example:
Mo-Fr 10:00-19:00
Sa,Su 10:00-22:00

field.label: Social Links
field.comment:
The list of social media links
Example:
https://twitter.com/mageworxteam
https://www.facebook.com/mageworx

field.label: Phone
field.comment: This field is recommended.

field.label: Country
field.comment: This field is recommended.

field.label: Location
field.comment:
This field is recommended.
Example: Seattle

field.label: Region
field.comment:
This field is recommended.
Example: WA

field.label: Street
field.comment:
This field is recommended.
Example:
20341 Whitworth Institute
405 N. Whitworth

field.label: Price Range
field.comment:
This field is recommended.
Example:
$$$
$31-60

group.label: Breadcrumbs
group.comment: The breadcrumbs settings add the breadcrumb snippet support.

field.label: Enable
field.comment: The breadcrumbs will be visible on the search results page

group.label: OpenGraph
group.comment: These settings let the store owner to deliver the highest quality posts on Facebook or other social networks and sharing the product links in messengers. Adding Open Graph tags to the store pages will help the Facebook Crawler pick up the right title and description for the shared page, as well as supply them with the most suitable preview image. Visit this page to learn more about the way Open Graph tags work.

field.label: Enable Product OG
field.comment: This setting will disable the default magento Open Graph output if enabled

field.comment: This setting allows you to select what product attribute will be used in OG description for product pages.

field.label: Image mode

field.comment: This setting allows you to select what category attribute will be used in OG description for category pages.

field.comment: Please specify a number of characters to crop og:description.

field.label: Enable Page OG

group.label: Twitter Cards
group.comment: These settings provide a media-rich experience to those who view your Twitter content. If enabled, the standard Tweet with the website URL will be transformed into the Summary Card and accompanied with an additional title, an extra up-to-200 words description, and an image. To enable the feature, make sure you enter Twitter Username. Visit this page to learn more about Twitter Cards.

field.comment: To enable the feature, make sure you enter Twitter Username.
